import React,{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AskNyaiApp(){const[query,setQuery]=useState("");const[response,setResponse]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async()=>{if(!query.trim())return;setLoading(true);setResponse(null);try{const res=await fetch("https://asknyai.onrender.com/analyze",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({platform:"web",user:"webuser",message:query})});const data=await res.json();setResponse(data.reply);}catch(err){setResponse("Sorry, something went wrong.");}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/asknyai-logo.jpg",alt:"AskNyai Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"AskNyai \u2013 Indian Legal Q&A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subtext",children:"Ask questions about Indian law and get answers powered by The Indian Constitution and the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"input-box",placeholder:"What is the punishment for theft under BNS?",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,className:"ask-button",children:loading?"Analyzing...":"Ask"}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"response-box",children:response})]});}
